# Web UI Framework
nicegui>=1.4.0

# SSH Client
paramiko>=3.0.0

# Configuration
pyyaml>=6.0

# Environment Variables
python-dotenv>=1.0.0

# Async I/O
aiofiles>=23.0.0

# Data Classes (Python 3.7+ has built-in, but explicit for clarity)
dataclasses>=0.6; python_version < '3.7'

# Logging
python-json-logger>=2.0.0

# MCP (Model Context Protocol) for Claude integration
mcp>=1.0.0
